abstractText: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā containing the third khaṇḍa (chapters 26-37). According to the colophon, the manuscript was written in the Ratnakīrti Mahāvihāra in Kathmandu.
abstractShort: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā containing the third khaṇḍa (chapters 26-37).
title: Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā
